title: S.F. school district hits back at Breed, city attorney over lawsuit: ‘An embarrassing day for San Francisco’
content:
1. S.F. school district hits back at Breed, city attorney over lawsuit: ‘An embarrassing day for San Francisco’  San Francisco Chronicle
  2. City of San Francisco Sues Own School Board for Refusing to Reopen Classrooms  National Review
  3. San Francisco sues its own school district, board over reopening: ‘They have earned an F’  San Francisco Chronicle
  4. San Francisco is suing its own schools after not reopening for almost a year  SFGate
  5. San Francisco sues its own school district to reopen classes  KCRA Sacramento
